concept.title: Bench Crafting
concept.shortdesc: A type of crafting that uses the Crafting bench, Orbs and Crafting Recipes.

ul.li: The Crafting Bench is an item located in the player's hideout.
The Crafting Recipes are hidden throughout the game's locations. After the player discovers them, they are added to the list of the Bench crafting options.
Veiled mofidiers, once discovered, are also available for craft via the Crafting Bench.
